Definition: People who invest time and resources into a project and are interested in the outcome.
RelevantDetails: Stakeholders better be informed early about design and can be reached out when there is a need of helping hand.

Definition: Data points that lie significantly outside the overall pattern of the data and could potentially skew the information.
RelevantDetails: Outliers can be detected out of scattered plot manually by looking at it; Outliers can be detected by math formula based beyond boundry on five-number summary and box plot; Outliers can have adverse effect. i.e k-means clustering is quite sensitive to outliers in your data set.
